TopicTitle: Burn Timer Display Failing to Update with Engine Thrust Limit Changes

Articles.Content: Burn from Kerbin to Minmus (870 m/s DV change) with a Terrier engine. With the thrust limiter set to ~ 50%, burn timer stated 2:01 total burn time. After changing the thrust limiter to 100%, stated time remains the same (2:01) but the burn takes the expected ~1 minute. So it looks like the burn is calculating properly after a thrust limiter change, it is just the time display that is not updating.
I can confirm the same from my playthroughs… starting the engine or ‘moving’ the node around triggers the duration to update, but I agree it should update “live”

Can also confirm

I find switching to another craft or tracking station and back updates it. But its quite annoying and can be easily calculated
